page.title: 11 A Cwmbran Farm
page.content:
Pentre-basket is a small 55 acre grazing farm. When Mr Price came there were just a few cotttages beside the canal. Now his farm is surrounded by the developing Hollybush Housing Estate, Ty-Coch Industrial site,a rubbish tip and Cwmbran Drive which is to be extended across one of his main hay fields. Newcomers, unfamiliar with rural ways often trespass causing damage to fences and crops. A once thriving community has declined. Mr Price is one of the few remaining farmers but slowly and surely his farm is being squeezed out by industrial development
Written after a visit by: Emma and Carla (Oakfield)
